price: 84. Nabii Muusa: usun ah keeni yok maxeeron yi-raatal yaniniih, anu koo fan isissike yi-Rabbow atu yoo takcinemkeh iyye.
arabic: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla hum ulāi ʿalā atharī waʿajil'tu ilayka rabbi litarḍā
